name: DeLite
short_description: DeLite is a lightweight Desktop Environment written in the D programming language. Our principle is to start small, reuse a number of existing components, and evolve / rewrite as we see fit. Join, you'll learn a lot and have fun in the process!

license.fullpath: License :: OSI-Approved Open Source :: GNU General Public License version 2.0 (GPLv2)
